content:
This year our lineup will feature great national acts such as Buckwheat Zydeco and Ronnie Earl as our headliners for this year. In addition we will have returning performers such as The Slam Allen Band and Mikey Junior Blues Revival. For a full list of the artist and lineup please go to Pennsylvania Blues Website.

Evening concerts are within walking distance of the festival and will be held inside the spacious Galleria Conference Center, so make sure to book your resort accommodations!

VIP Tickets are now available.

The VIP Package is the ultimate way to experience this award winning National event with an "All Area Access Pass."

Your VIP Package features:

  • VIP commemorative laminates
  • Festival admission Saturday & Sunday
  • Admissions to Friday & Saturday Night Showcase shows including dinner buffets
  • Admission to Sunday Blues Brunch
  • Access to main stage photo pit for photo opportunities
  • One festival t-shirt (per VIP customer)
  • VIP Parking
  • More to come

The sooner you book your VIP package the better the deal!

  • 1 Person/2 People - $199/$349 – January 2, 2016 through August 1, 2016
  • 1 Person/2 People - $235/$419 – August 2, 2016– September 15, 2016
